item.description: Have a few laughs & donate to the homeless right before Thanksgiving with the improv comedy of Unforgettable Mousetraps and Rebels Without Applauze. Many people from the Improv Incubator are performing in the show so come check it out for a good cause. Show starts at 8 p.m. Tickets cost only $5. Bring a box or can of food for the homeless – vegetables, soups, cereal, macaroni and cheese – and we will donate $1 of our proceeds also. All food goods and donations will go to a nearby homeless shelter. https://www.facebook....
item.name: Give Thanks, Get Laughs Comedy Show
